official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Public Health Service Act relating to the compensation for professional, scientific, and executive positions within the National Institutes of Health.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to exempt professional, scientific, and executive positions within the National Institutes of Health from the compensation limitations of level V of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Public Health Service Act relating to the compensation for professional, scientific, and executive positions within the National Institutes of Health.
